value.title: How to create a Export to Excel / CSV button in Power BI
value.excerpt: In todays video I will show you how to create and export to excel or CSV button in Power BI!! Take a look!  Chapters: 00:00 Intro 01:30 Export to CSV button 05:15 Apply the flow to the button 05:30 Format the flow button 06:00 Check if the flow run sucessfully 08:00 Export to excel button 09:30 Pre-requisites

value.title: Drilling into drillthrough in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at how you can use the drillthrough feature within Power BI Desktop. He also looks at how you can drill to multiple fields at the same time. The back image can also be changed and Patrick shows you how to do it!  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com --

value.title: Getting started with Power BI Paginated Reports (2021)
value.excerpt: Not sure what Power BI Paginated Reports are or how to use them? Patrick walks you through and points you to some great resources to get up and running quickly.  Power BI Paginated Reports require either Power BI Premium Per User or Power BI Premium capacity.  Paginated Report In a Day: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/learning-catalog/paginated-reports-online-course

value.title: How to get a DATE TABLE easily in Power BI
value.excerpt: Do you use a central date table for your Power BI datasets? There is a LOT of POWER in having one. Adam shows you different ways to create one including a really simple easy option that's BANANAS!  REDUCE Power BI dataset size by 60% with ONE CHECKBOX??? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RnDdDlozcdo  Bravo

value.title: Power BI Apps for multiple audiences has arrived!
value.excerpt: This has been a feature that has been asked for long time! The ability to control who can see what content within a published Power BI App! You can now serve up multiple audiences within a single app.  Announcing Public Preview of Multiple Audiences for Power BI Apps https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/announcing-public-preview-of-multiple-audiences-for-power-bi-apps/

value.title: Power BI for Mac?! Learn How to Make it Work! 🛠️
value.excerpt: Power BI for MAC? Do we have it? Do we not? I will show you step-by-step how you can use Power BI on MAC. What works, what doesn't and the workarounds. value.title: Power BI: How to Combine Multiple Excel Files from a Folder
value.excerpt: Bonus Video part of www.LearnPowerBI.com training program. In this video I explain how you can use Power BI to combine data from multiple excel files. I also show, for complex scenarios, how you can modify the "Sample File" that Power BI Query automatically creates, in order to update the "Custom Function"

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 03: Power BI Reporting - Part 2
value.excerpt: In this video, we demonstrate viewing two reports, one a Power BI report, and the other a paginated report.  The Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day online course aims to empower you as a report author with the technical knowledge required to create, publish, and distribute Power BI paginated reports.

value.title: KPI Visual in Power BI Explained
value.excerpt: If you are showing an important measure value in the report, and you want to compare it with a target and see if it meets the target or not, The KPI visual comes in handy. The KPI Visual’s behavior, however, might be a bit hard to understand, In this article and video, I explained how this visual works,

value.title: Row Context in DAX
value.excerpt: Understanding the difference between row context and filter context is the first and most important concept to learn to use DAX correctly. This video introduces the row context. Article and download: https://sql.bi/746944?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: Specifying multiple filter conditions in CALCULATE
value.excerpt: The filter arguments in CALCULATE can reference multiple columns from the same table in a single predicate: This is possible since March 2021 in Power BI, before that it was possible to filter a single column reference.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/705207?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt

value.title: Why Power BI totals might seem wrong
value.excerpt: A common question is why Power BI totals are inaccurate because they do not display the sum of individual rows. In this video, we explain the reasons why those totals are correct. Article and download: https://sql.bi/772093?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 data​
value.excerpt: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 Data​

value.title: Explore data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Turn your business intelligence data into data insights by creating and configuring Power BI dashboards.

value.title: Perform analytics in Power BI
value.excerpt: You will learn how to use Power BI to perform data analytical functions, how to identify outliers in your data, how to group data together, and how to bin data for analysis. You will also learn how to perform time series analysis. Finally, you will work with advanced analytic features of Power BI, such as Quick Insights, AI Insights, and the Analyze feature.

value.title: Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures)
value.excerpt: Everyone tells you that you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI. Not so fast! Patrick shows you how you can use quick measures, like year over year, with a quick measure and no date table!
